short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Echanted way to experience the Eras tour on Disney Plus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you ready for it? Take control of your Disney Plus Eras Tour experience with a swift click!

With the Eras Tour Playlist Controller, you can skip through the official setlist just like you’re out of the woods. Whether you want to relive your favorite song forever and always or jump back to a moment that makes you feel fearless, this extension gives you the power to navigate the concert with ease.

Features:

	•	Next and Previous Buttons: Skip effortlessly between songs in the exact order of the Eras Tour setlist, like you’re the 1 in control.
	•	Full Setlist: Move through Taylor’s iconic performance without missing a beat—no blank spaces here!
	•	Simple & Intuitive: A user-friendly design that makes it feel like everything has changed—concert control has never been easier.

For Swifties who want to relive the wildest dreams of the Eras Tour, this extension is your gold rush. Install now and enjoy the concert just the way you like it—because you belong with me!
